name: Billionaires Pixel Club
description: BILLIONAIRE PIXEL CLUB [BPC] is the Project Token from one BillionairePixelClub Project 1.000 x 1.000 Pixel = 1.000.000 Pixel total number BPC TOKEN = 1.000.000.000 BPC The more pixels are paid with BPC, the higher the value of the project token increases. This incentive not only creates a higher reach for the NFT project but also an increase in the overall Attractiveness of the token currency. The marketing function is also supported by the continuous increase in value of the project token another advantage achieved for the NFT project.
